Articles.Content: I did, just haven't really needed one though
When will you be releasing your new system?
When I have time to do so, been a bit busy and away from my desktop
Is there still interest in this?

I know I am interested, your planets are fantastic! I don't know how many downloads you have gotten but you have over 11,000 views. It seems like a lot of people are interested. Just don't want to bother you if you are busy.

Are you going to release your new system?
yeah, just finishing it up

You said you changed the size of Rocky. Are you going to also update the Boris system?

I used to script single player missions for the Men of War games, and created well over a hundred scenery objects for other Sims. And I can tell you from experience 99% of people do not comment on what you are creating. I comment because I've been there and I know how much work you guys put in.

A lack of comments does not mean that there is no interest.

Edited March 20, 2014 by Larrt_M
well rocky has become a lot smaller and I'm trying to get the SOI in the double digits for challenge reasons
...I forgot to upload didn't I?
I don't see a new link....

having some connectivity issues atm, will be up when I can get it to work

(takes me 25 minutes to upload)
Clouds!!! We need clouds!!!!
make your own damn clouds. I'll add them in

Ok the Wot System is now available

Pictures forthcoming

Very nice!

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-03-2807-36-49-00.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/KSP2014-03-2808-03-56-24.jpg
just a heads up, has a retrograde moon in system. (it orbits opposite direction of the others)

I modified a texture I had to create a couple of alternate textures for Wot. I kinda like this one... The other is even a bit lighter.

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/Texture1pic2.jpg

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/Texture1.jpg

Just created a couple more that are red with yellow and orange bands. One of those may go better in this system. Gota keep changing the eye candy!

http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad343/Larry_M/Texture-5.jpg

Edited April 3, 2014 by Larrt_M
nice might do something like that. I couldn't quite get Wot looking like I wanted

Your planets has interesting shapes!

Especially peabody.

Nice work!

nice might do something like that. I couldn't quite get Wot looking like I wanted

If you like I would gladly modify a texture that you have?

Edited April 4, 2014 by Larrt_M
sure go wild

Is Peabody coming with a giant spacesnail?

Looks cool with these caves

No, the last space snail was hunted to extinction by French Kerbals.

Also those holes are about 20 km deep.

By comparison everest is about 6.4 km

marianas trench is about 11km
hey, it still works. ha, HA!. Take that, puny update, we still stand strong.
anyone still use this?
